name: Eliminator Boat Duel
summary: Eliminator Boat Duel is a powerboat racing video game developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System by Sculptured Software and Radioactive Software. It was published by Electro Brain in 1991.
info:
• 中文名: 赛艇决战
  • 平台: FC
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 1991年11月
  • 开发: Sculptured Software
  • 发行: Electro Brain
